scripts.prebuild: npm run cp_dir && npm run cp_js & npm run cp_fonts & npm run cp_css
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.start: npm run prebuild && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.clean: find assets/js -type f -not -name 'main.js' -delete && find assets/fonts -type f -delete && find assets/css -type f -not -name 'styles.scss' -delete
scripts.deploy_code: git checkout master && git pull && git add * && git commit -m "Auto deploy" && git push
scripts.deploy_site: git checkout gh-pages && git pull && cp -r _site/* . && git add * && git commit -m "Auto deploy" && git push && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run clean && npm run deploy_code && npm run deploy_site
scripts.cp_dir: mkdirp assets/js & mkdirp assets/fonts & mkdirp assets/css
